details.root_cause: dashboard_routes.py was trying to import from app.modules.orchestrator_memory but failing with an ImportError

solution_implemented.flexible_import_paths: Added support for multiple import paths (app.modules.orchestrator_memory, modules.orchestrator_memory, .orchestrator_memory)
solution_implemented.file_path_resolution: Added checks for module file existence at multiple possible locations
solution_implemented.direct_memory_writer: Added fallback to use memory_writer functions directly if orchestrator_memory can't be imported
solution_implemented.mock_implementation: Enhanced mock implementation as final fallback

details.expected_outcome: Dashboard will be able to import memory functions through one of the multiple paths or fallbacks
